pages.text: Werewolves are cursed warriors who transform under the full moon. Their claws tear through enemies with immense power.

pages.title: Becoming a Werewolf
pages.text: Players can become werewolves by: \n- Being bitten by an Alpha Werewolf.

pages.title: Weaknesses
pages.text: - Silver weapons deal increased damage. \n- Forced transformations under a full moon. \n- Cannot attack vampires without taking damage.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text:
- Beast Reflexes 
- Pack Call (Summon wolves) 
- Moon Howl (Terrifies enemies) 
- Regeneration
